      • apiCall

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> apiCall​(long id,
                                                                java.lang.String[] params)
        This method executes functions based on request parameters and concatenates the results into JSON response.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of scenario that functions will be called on.
        params - The string that determines what api functions will be called/applied.
        Returns:
        A JSON response containing results of called api functions.

        Returns:
        dot-use ready String
